column5: This website is run by a good friend of mine.. and she alerted me to this... I would have never known..  http://askpeggy.ca/2013/02/the-right-way-to-eat-a-chicken-wing/  Goes along way when the shore lunch pan is empty......  No if she could just figure out how to get the bones outta my fillets....
I will be giving that a try very soon! Obviously I have not had enough of that food group yet! Thanks for posting!
Insert 2 bone chicken wing into mouth while holding the bigger end. Close lips/teeth/choppers, extract chicken bones with no meat on them.
really, instructions needed to eat a wing?????
